titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of National Nurses Week from May 6, 2015, through May 12, 2015.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 5/12/2015--Introduced. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Nurses Week. Recognizes the contributions of nurses to the U.S. health care system.
